devices_included: Public display; Wall display; Mobile displays in general
use_cases_desc: The example use case is a conference guide
contribution_desc: A multi-user and multi-device conference program guide where users can access conference information on a public shared display or on a mobile device application. The mobile application can also connect to the shared public display to remote control the display via voice commands and gestures.
additional_hardware: Low-cost PC to run the server
deployment: Demonstration at a conference (Pervasive 2010 and MindTrek 2010)
toolkits: C# and Java; Piccolo toolkit; SQLite; Nokia Qt library; Maemo 5 and Symbian platforms; Qt Mobility package on Symbian
